overview: One Clara was rather loud, the other Marie, a little too stuck up and the third Kitty, very sexy, a little too loose...  They will tell everything! How to hunt the male on the Internet... Do not go to bed on the 1st night... Catch the rare pearl... Drop his boxes at his house... Put the mother-in-law in his pocket... Take him to the altar without scaring him... And above all keep him on a leash!  Before the evening, it was football evening on TV, from now on it's: Adopt a Jules.com  A light comedy for girls and for boys with a sense of humor!
title: Adopte un Jules.com
